name: Rex Strummer
dialogue_tone: Rex's voice is deep and gravelly, often laced with sarcasm. He favors short, clipped sentences and mumbles when annoyed. His laughter, though rare, is contagious and often catches others off guard.

personality_traits.description: Rex prefers solitude and enjoys his own company.
Finds humor in unlikely places and has a contagious laugh.
He has a quick temper, especially when things don't go as planned.
Fiercely independent, treasures his freedom above all.

living_conditions: Lives in a secluded apartment, maintaining a low profile.
Work-life heavily tilted towards his thrill-inducing job.
Daily routines involve scouting locations and meticulous planning.
